thread.section_title: DID Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DID | www.did.ie | 2 of 41
thread.title: TOM

author: TOM
title: TOM
text: I recently purchased a laptop, I was informed it would take a few days to arrive ( purchased Saturday, due date following Wednesday) however arriving back on Wednesday no sign - calling Thursday to find out it was on a van- Friday no sign - miraculously it appeared on Friday evening - the manager had the cheek to repackage the display model - as if I would not notice . In saying that I did not complain as the service was that poor the service after complaining would be worse.
